ModMetaData.name: The Firm
ModMetaData.author: Trokare
ModMetaData.description:
Introducing a new industrial lawless faction : the Firm
The Firm is a interplanetary conglomerate of free minded entreprenors ready to take the risks inherent to setting their sight on lawless Rimworlds in the hope of earning matching profits.
The Firm is specialised in providing sub-contractors and consultants, selling medical and recreation medicine treatements as well as providing settlements with high quality and reliability security equipments.
[Author's word :] This is a mod I made for fun and to learn modding, trying to create an spacer/lawless faction with more character than the vanilla factions that are basically random and uninspired.
The Firm's pawns are hand picked to fit the theme "Lawless Corporate Brutality" : apparel, weapons, traits, bionics etc. etc.
As such, beware, they are more effective than raiders from vanilla : you won't find a god-like brawler/though/melee16 pawn armed only with a crappy bow.
You won't necessarly have to fight them : If you're an industrial/spacer faction, the Firm will consider you potential customers and send you traders, it's only if releationship degrade that you're going to be raided.
But if you're a tribal faction, they may send recruiters to invit you to join modern civilisation and become a productive member of society.
This mod also include : - Integration with Vanilla Expended team's mods as it was inspired by the Coilguns as well as the core weapons and armours modules. - Several custom settlement map for the faction : production centers, education facilities, headquarters of the firm etc. etc. - Pawns hard to recruit and enslave because snitches get stitches, most of the time you're better of killing them outright or sending them back to the firm for goodwill. - A trader and a trade ship because the Firm is all about sweet, sweet profits
